note.p: American teacher and minister. BA, Union Christian College, Merom, Indiana, 1878. Minister and teacher in Missouri, 1880. Minister in Illinois.
Christians’ Annual for the year of our lord, 1897 (Dayton, Ohio: Christian Publishing Association), p. 112
Twenty-fifth annual catalogue of the officers and students of Union Christian College at Merom, Sullivan County, Indiana (Sullivan, Indiana: Murray Briggs and son, 1886)
United States Federal Census 1880 (Tyler, Hickory, Missouri 237/498A) (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 March 2017)
U.S., Find a grave index, 1600s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 March 2017)
